channel.title: Docker on Spelling of SARDONYX
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on Spelling of SARDONYX

item.title: Running a feap program using Docker
item.description: Preface feap(A Finite Element Analysis Program) This is a finite element analysis program in Japanese. I was asked by an acquaintance if I could execute the learning code of this program, so I created an environment using Docker. The code I created is here The official website of feap is here Suffering First, I searched on GitHub for Docker feap and no luck, and got only one hit. I found the Dockerfile, but the link specified in the file was broken, so I couldn’t build it.
